publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3684.1 Dr Jean Turner: Future Arrangements for Health Services in the Argyll and Clyde Area—As an amendment to motion (S2M-3684) in the name of Mr Andy Kerr, insert at end “to as many services local to the people as possible and sustaining the Vale of Leven Hospital as an essential part of local services, including the integrated model of care set up between general practitioners and consultants.” Supported by: Margo MacDonald*
